arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe spot-on for Real Madrid while Juventus deny Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Qarabag stunned Benfica with a comeback from 2-0 down while Arsenal and Tottenham opened with wins in the Champions League

arts.ttl: Champions League roundup: Juventus stun Dortmund with late double in 4-4 epic
arts.sum: Qarabag fight back from 2-0 down to beat Benfica Union Saint-Gilloise win at PSV on league phase debut It was a dramatic opening night in the Champions League, with Juventus and Borussia Dortmund sharing eight second-half goals while Qarabag shocked Benfica. Dusan Vlahovic and Lloyd Kelly scored in stoppage time to inspire a dramatic Juventus escape, as they secured a 4-4 draw in a game where all eight goals came after the break. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Eight goals in 45 minutes - Juventus and Dortmund write Champions League history
arts.sum: It is a result that has only happened four times in UEFA Champions League history. On Tuesday, Juventus overcame a two-goal deficit to secure a 4-4 draw at home against Borussia Dortmund. First,...

arts.ttl: Round-up: Juventus and Dortmund draw eight-goal thriller
arts.sum: Juventus drew an eight-goal thriller against Borussia Dortmund and Kylian Mbappé fired Real Madrid to victory as the 2025/26 league phase kicked off.

arts.ttl: Juventus’ 4-4 draw against Dortmund shows their good and bad side
arts.sum: Serie A side Juventus played out a thrilling 4-4 draw against Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League today, grabbing two stoppage time goals to come back from 4-2 down and…

arts.ttl: Dortmund denied victory as Juventus strike late in eight-goal thriller
arts.sum: A thrilling encounter at the Allianz Stadium in Turin ended in a 4-4 draw with all eight goals coming in the second-half.
